ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@.chaw@li.0@a@text}} · {{@@#uptime@span@text##^20}}
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
<js>
result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+\s/,'$1 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)(、|. ?)/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)*/,'$1 $2$3')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
.replace(/第0+/,'第')
.replace(/(第\d+章)\s\d+(.*)/,'$1$2')
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));

java.log("【设置信息】\n域名"+v+":"+Nam+"/"+burl+"\n分类"+ID+":"+Name+"/"+flag);

//burl=source.getKey().match(/([^#]*)/)[1];
uri=decodeURIComponent(baseUrl.match(/uri=([^&]*)/)[1]);
cid = baseUrl.match(/cid=(\d+)/)[1];
page = java.get("page")
time=Math.round(new Date()/1000);

if(baseUrl.match(/rank-list/)){
t="i3aphc4zg3hmmcq0appId=&channel_id="+cid+"&marketChannel=none&osType=2&packageName=com.uniyun.Uaa701B671&page_num="+page+"&product=1&sysVer=7.1.2&time="+time+"&token=&udid=a71d7896-33c6-372b-8ac2-b66cce73b30e&ver=3.5.18je1sc1htum1hvutpso79oigrx8pv2gx";
sign=java.md5Encode(t).toUpperCase(); 
body={"sign":sign,"packageName":"com.uniyun.Uaa701B671","time":time,"token":"","marketChannel":"none","appId":"","page_num":page,"sysVer":"7.1.2","osType":"2","channel_id":cid,"udid":"a71d7896-33c6-372b-8ac2-b66cce73b30e","ver":"3.5.1","product":"1"};
}

else{
	status = baseUrl.match(/status=(\d+)/)[1];
	cat = baseUrl.match(/cat=(\d+)/)[1];	
t="i3aphc4zg3hmmcq0appId=&cat="+cat+"&channel_id="+cid+"&flag="+flag+"&marketChannel=none&osType=2&packageName=com.qingyuleku.app&page_num="+page+"&product=1&status="+status+"&sysVer=7.1.2&time="+time+"&token=&udid=a71d7896-33c6-372b-8ac2-b66cce73b30e&ver=3.5.1&words=08je1sc1htum1hvutpso79oigrx8pv2gx";
sign=java.md5Encode(t).toUpperCase(); 
body={"sign":sign,"packageName":"com.qingyuleku.app","time":time,"token":"","marketChannel":"none","words":"0","appId":"","page_num":page,"flag":flag,"sysVer":"7.1.2","status":status,"osType":"2","channel_id":cid,"udid":"a71d7896-33c6-372b-8ac2-b66cce73b30e","ver":"3.5.1","cat":cat,"product":"1"};
	}
      	  option={"method":"POST","body":JSON.stringify(body)};
	     url=burl+uri+","+JSON.stringify(option);  

java.log(url);
java.ajax(url);
</js>
